changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, r.id, r.name, r.description, r.notes, up.name AS updated_by, r.version FROM existential r JOIN existential up ON r.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN workspace_authorization wa ON r.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN existential w ON wa.defining_product = w.id WHERE r.domain = 'Agency'
